\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
The file information structure. This is analogous to the P\+O\+S\+IX stat structure.

\subsubsection[{\texorpdfstring{filetype}{filetype}}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf apr\+\_\+filetype\+\_\+e} apr\+\_\+finfo\+\_\+t\+::filetype}\hypertarget{structapr__finfo__t_a274ae0dd60b59182c2e0134bc9a09a20}{}\label{structapr__finfo__t_a274ae0dd60b59182c2e0134bc9a09a20}
The type of file. One of A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+R\+EG, A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+D\+IR, A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+C\+HR, A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+B\+LK, A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+P\+I\+PE, A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+L\+NK or A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+S\+O\+CK. If the type is undetermined, the value is A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+N\+O\+F\+I\+LE. If the type cannot be determined, the value is A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+U\+N\+K\+F\+I\+LE. \index{apr\+\_\+finfo\+\_\+t@{apr\+\_\+finfo\+\_\+t}!fname@{fname}}
